>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/image-svc/serve/upload/{fileId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves and serves a previously uploaded image file using its File ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"FileID uniquely identifies the file itself (not an ID, which represents a specific replica)","in":"path","name":"fileId","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"description":"Optional width to resize the image to","in":"query","name":"width","schema":{"type":"integer"}},{"description":"Optional height to resize the image to","in":"query","name":"height","schema":{"type":"integer"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"File served successfully","content":{"application/octet-stream":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}},"400":{"description":"Missing File ID","content":{"application/octet-stream":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"404":{"description":"File Not Found","content":{"application/octet-stream":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error","content":{"application/octet-stream":{"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"type":"object"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
